rules_text:
[i](As a Conquest enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You and others can attack it. When it’s defeated, put it onto the battlefield transformed.)[/i]
When Battle for Tempest Reach enters the battlefield, return target nonland permanent an opponent controls to its owner’s hand, then return target Kraken card from your graveyard to your hand.
rules_text2: {T}: Add {G} or {U}. When that mana is spent to cast a spell with mana value 3 or less, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy. [i](A copy of a permanent spell enters as a token.)[/i]
